content.text:
[@elavoie](@IgYpd+tCtXnlE2tYX/8rR2AGt+P8svC98WH3MdYAa8Y=.ed25519)

I haven't read through the code, but my intuition is that this is a reduce function that goes by the latest *received* edit. This sort of thing works fine when you only have one person editing content (e.g. editing your own messages) but I think we'll need #ssb-revisions to save the day when we have multiple people editing the same content.
